short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Asnap: Effortlessly Create & Share How-To Product Guides

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Empower your users with clear, step-by-step guides! 🤩

Asnap is the all-in-one solution for micro saas businesses to create and share effective how-to guides directly from their browser 👨🏻‍💻

Effortless Guide Creation in Seconds 🚀

✅ Install the extension and click the Asnap icon to capture your product steps. Asnap smartly auto-captures screens and clicks, saving you time.

✅ Customize your guides with ease – blur sensitive information, draw arrows for clarity, add text to each step, and adjust colors and styles to match your brand.

Streamlined Sharing & Organization 🤝

✅ Share your guides with a single, easy-to-remember link, perfect for embedding in support documentation or sharing with colleagues.

✅ Organize your guides into collections. Group related guides together and share them as a single link, making navigation a breeze.

Boost User Onboarding & Support 🤘🏻

✅ Craft clear, concise how-to guides that empower users to navigate your SaaS product with ease.

✅Reduce support tickets by providing users with readily available self-help resources.

🔥 Coming Soon! 🔥

AI Content Generation 🤯 : Let Asnap suggest text for your guides, saving you even more time. (This feature is currently under development)

Advanced Analytics 📊 : Gain valuable insights into how your guides are performing. (Coming Soon)

Multiple Export Options 📂 : Export your guides as PDFs for offline use or embed them directly into your platform. (Coming Soon)

Seamless Integrations ⛓️‍💥 : Connect Asnap with your favorite tools like HubSpot, Gitbook, Document360, Notion, and HelpDocs. (Coming Soon)
